meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of mosquitoes of the genus Anopheles.
meanings.sent1: The anopheline mosquitoes are known for spreading malaria.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the anopheline species to understand their behavior.
meanings.sent3: The anopheline mosquito threw a tiny party in the stagnant water.
meanings.sent4: The anopheline presence in the room was as noticeable as a buzzing alarm.
meanings.sent5: The anopheline characteristics make them easily distinguishable from other mosquitoes.

meanings.definition: A mosquito of the genus Anopheles.
meanings.sent1: An anopheline can transmit diseases like malaria to humans.
meanings.sent2: The anopheline buzzed near the camper's ear during the night.
meanings.sent3: The anopheline mosquito decided to take up knitting as a hobby.
meanings.sent4: The anopheline in the room was a silent threat waiting to strike.
meanings.sent5: The anopheline's presence in the tent made sleep impossible for the campers.
